title: Shawn Messenger Fine Art Glass Blue and Yellow Florals Paperweight
description:
The artist for our floral paperweight creates a miniature fantasy garden using layers of colorful glass canes.  Due to the handcrafted nature of this paperweight sizes and colors will vary slightly.  Signed by the artist.  Made in the USA. 0.5 lbs.

2 1/4 in. sq.
